settings.hideSkeletonHatBones: 隐藏骷髅头盔骨头屏障
settings.skeletonHatBonesBar: 骷髅头盔可抵挡攻击次数
settings.hideFoodAndArmor: 隐藏饱食度 & 装甲值
settings.disableEmberRodAbility: 在你的岛屿上关闭余烬之杖技能
settings.hideAuctionHousePlayers: 隐藏重要 NPC 附近的玩家
settings.showItemAnvilUses: 显示物品铁砧合成次数
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: 阻止切换物品栏菜单时光标重置
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: 将末地中末影箱渲染为绿色
settings.stopDroppingSellingRareItems: 防止把贵重的物品买了

messages.dropConfirmation: 再次丢弃此物品以确认!
messages.labymod: Labymod使用者: 隐藏食物, 装甲值, 以及血条, 不兼容。
messages.minionCannotReach: 有一个%type%仆从无法触及到生物而停止运作了!
messages.minionIsFull: 有一个仆从因为背包已满而停止运作了!
messages.separateMultiple: 请使用英文标点逗号以间隔多个目标。
messages.deleteOldFile: The download has finished, please open your mods folder using the button below, close your Minecraft, and delete the old version (or delete it later if you prefer).

update.majorAvailable: A new major update (%version%) is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
update.patchAvailable: A new patch update (%version%) is available! Look in chat for download options!
update.downloading: The patch is downloading! Status: %downloaded%/%total% Please note that after the download has finished, you must delete the old file.
update.failed: The patch download has failed! Please download it manually using the link in chat.
update.downloadFinished: The patch has finished downloading. It has been saved as %file%. Please don't forget to delete the old file after closing your Minecraft. Click the message in chat to open up the folder.

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons阻止你破坏此作物，请使用空手来进行破坏。
messages.cancelledCaneBreak: SkyblockAddons 已阻止你破坏此甘蔗。如果你真的想要破坏它，请使用其他工具。
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: SkyblockAddons阻止了你在持弓的时候打开他人的档案。
messages.cancelledDropping: SkyblockAddons 防止了你把这个工具或物品扔掉
messages.clickMoreTimes: 如果你想要把这个东西掉了，在如果你想要把这个东西掉了，在点击%times% 次
